paragraphs.text:
%md
# Welcome to the Big Data User Journeys

The Big Data User Journeys help users get started using Oracle Cloud services with a purpose. This particular journey is designed to show you techniques you can use to build your own New Data Lake.


![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/millerhoo/journey2-new-data-lake/master/workshops/journey2-new-data-lake/images/snap0012028.jpg)

## How to View the Lab Guides

- The Labguides are best viewed using the Workshop's [GitHub Pages Website URL](https://oracle.github.io/learning-library/workshops/journey2-new-data-lake/) 

- Once you are viewing the Workshop's GitHub Pages website, you can see a list of Lab Guides at any time by clicking on the **Menu Icon**

    ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/millerhoo/journey2-new-data-lake/master/workshops/journey2-new-data-lake/images/WorkshopMenu.png)  

- At this point you should be able to navigate to the Lab 200 guide at the GitHub Pages website. Or follow the quick start next steps below.

msg.data:
Welcome to the Big Data User Journeys

The Big Data User Journeys help users get started using Oracle Cloud services with a purpose. This particular journey is designed to show you techniques you can use to build your own New Data Lake.

How to View the Lab Guides

  • The Labguides are best viewed using the Workshop’s GitHub Pages Website URL

  • Once you are viewing the Workshop’s GitHub Pages website, you can see a list of Lab Guides at any time by clicking on the Menu Icon

  • At this point you should be able to navigate to the Lab 200 guide at the GitHub Pages website. Or follow the quick start next steps below.

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Quick Start Next Steps


### **STEP 1**: Click on the Notebook tab.



### **STEP 2**: Expand the Journeys folder.  Then expand the New Data Lake folder.  Then click on the title of the "Tutorial 1 Notebook Basics" note.


![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/millerhoo/journey2-new-data-lake/master/workshops/journey2-new-data-lake/images/200/snap0012200.jpg) 



### **STEP 3**: Read and follow the instructions in Tutorial 1

- The paragraphs of the note are displayed. 

Please walk through the paragraphs one by one. Read through the content of the paragraphs as you get to them. There is much useful information in the paragraphs that is not reproduced into these instructions.
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/millerhoo/journey2-new-data-lake/master/workshops/journey2-new-data-lake/images/200/snap0012202.jpg)

msg.data:
Quick Start Next Steps

STEP 1: Click on the Notebook tab.

STEP 2: Expand the Journeys folder. Then expand the New Data Lake folder. Then click on the title of the “Tutorial 1 Notebook Basics” note.

STEP 3: Read and follow the instructions in Tutorial 1

  • The paragraphs of the note are displayed.

Please walk through the paragraphs one by one. Read through the content of the paragraphs as you get to them. There is much useful information in the paragraphs that is not reproduced into these instructions.
